title: "Why didn't you ban Cho'Gath?"
body:
Me: "I asked for what bans people wanted in champ select, you never spoke up."

Olaf: "You should know what to ban."

Then he proceeded to feed Cho'Gath and blame everyone except himself.

-20 LP

*sigh*

How's your night GD? Are you having such trouble falling asleep that you're reading the rants of salty player so early on a weekday?
